metadata.name: Engage Flight Mode
metadata.description:
September 26th, in 2019,  
Awaken by 5AM, a struggle unreal,  
Daybreak emerges, a radiant glimmer, a gleam,  
Cappadocia beckons, a hot airy dream.

Symbolizing daybreak, liftoff, and rebirth,  
We float above, transcending Earth,  
In the eternal now, we understand,  
The finite nature of spacetime's grand.

Time, a fraud, a figment, a lie,  
Finite and eternal, yet fleeting, oh my!  
Each pulse and whisper, forever ingrained,  
An indelible mark, on existence maintained.

The past, a mirage, a memory wanes,  
The future, a fiction, from present refrains,  
The now, the truth, the essence of life,  
In this very moment, our souls resonate.

So we rise above, embracing the present,  
Grasping the truth, so luminescent,  
For as we soar, in Cappadocia's sky,  
We know the now is where we are.
